You wanted to know why you were here. You crawled towards the grate, passing the left path and neared the grate cautiously. You could understand the voices now. You peered through the grate and saw two female nurses, standing in what seemed to be an all-white hallway. They appeared to be rather young, neither of them older than 30.

"I went in there and the cell was empty!" said one nurse to the other.

"He said he captured her, right?" asked the other nurse.

"Yeah, that's what he said, but I never saw her."

"We can't have her running around here, half-naked. Alert the guards and close off all the exits. We need her for the experiment."

You clasped your hand to your mouth, muting your gasp. Experiment? Just what the hell were they planning on doing to you? You were here against your will and you have no idea how you got here, so you imagine it couldn't be anything good. You looked closer and noticed the nurses seemed to both be holding something in their hands. It looked like a large, white rectangle, but you weren't really sure what it was.

"Go and have him find her then. It's not our responsibility to keep them in their cells. We're just here to-ugh-do more than we're paid for. Gross, I just don't want another morning like this one. I can't wait until my part in this thing is done," said the first nurse. She had deep, brown hair.

"Well, that's what we signed up for. It was all in the description," said the other nurse, her hair blonde. Her voice seemed a bit sweeter than the other nurse's. "Yeah it's gross, but just be thankful we have these." She waved the white rectangle in her hand and you heard a crinkle come from it as she did. You realized what it was. It was a diaper! But not a baby's diaper! A diaper big enough to fit someone your size! You had no idea they made them that big! It was so thick.

As you were stunned by this sight, you failed to hear the creaking of the vent.

"Diapers?! Why diapers? This is all so confusing," you thought. The vent creaked louder, this time catching your attention. It also caught the attention of the nurses below.

"What was that?" asked the blonde nurse.

"It came from the vent," said the brunette nurse, "You don't think-"

"She might be. Alert security. I'll try to follow the sounds and keep you updated." The brunette nurse dashed off down the hallway.

"No! They found me!" you thought and you tried to back up and keep moving through the vent. But as you did so, the vent could handle no more. Though you only weighed 120 pounds, the vent wasn't built to hold weight within it for long. The vent split in two right where you were sitting and with a yelp you fell out.

You crashed to the floor hard on your side. The wind was knocked out of you. You gasped for air as you watched the blonde nurse slowly walk towards you, diaper in hand.

"Well well well, looks like we found our escapee," she said. The brunette nurse came running up from behind, hearing the crash and coming back.

"That's her?" asked the brown-haired nurse.

"Yep. He said she had two pink streaks in her hair. Just perfect," said the blonde nurse, her mouth twisting into a slight grin, "Thought you could get away, did you?"

You slowly pushed yourself into a sitting position and began backing away from the two nurses.

"Should we just diaper her here in the hallway?" asked the brunette nurse, beginning to open the huge diaper in her hand.

"No. It's not part of the experiment. In fact, everything going on right now could potentially mess up the results," said the blonde, "We'd better get her back in her cell and ask him how we should continue. Remember, we just attend to them. We're grunts and nothing more."

You weren't about to let that happen. You weren't about to go back in a cell and let these people do who-knows-what to you. You couldn't help but feel annoyed as the two spoke about you as if you weren't even there, or your opinion didn't matter.

"Let's take her back. Give me the shot," said the brunette. The blonde nurse handed her a syringe full of a green liquid and the two neared you.
